name: Pillars of Stability
description:
Pillars of Stability is a 3D turn-based strategy world-building game with a focus on maintaining a balance between military strength, economic growth and cultural prominence as you expand your empire. Can you survive 2 years of reign?

Controls
  • [LMB] to drag tiles
  • [WASD] or [MMB] to move camera
  • [ESC] to pause
